articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: Update your Chrome browser ASAP to avoid this security exploit - The Verge
articles.description: A critical security update is now available for some Chrome users that patches a zero-day vulnerability making systems vulnerable to data theft and other cyber attacks.
articles.content:
PSA: Update Chrome browser now to avoid an exploit already in the wild

articles.author: Ben Blanchard, Andrew Silver
articles.title: Taiwan urges elderly, young to avoid China visits due to respiratory illnesses - Reuters
articles.description: Taiwan's health ministry on Thursday urged the elderly, very young and those with poor immunity to avoid travel to China due to the recent increase in respiratory illnesses there, a move some experts said was ineffective to manage public health risks.
articles.content: TAIPEI/SHANGHAI, Nov 30 (Reuters) - Taiwan's health ministry on Thursday urged the elderly, very young and those with poor immunity to avoid travel to China due to the recent increase in respiratory … [+2409 chars]

articles.author: Nick Miller
articles.title: Bully Ray Invokes Twisted Sister In Discussing Triple H, CM Punk's WWE Return - Wrestling Inc.
articles.description: WWE Hall of Famer Bully Ray made an interesting comparison while discussing Paul Levesque&#39;s comments on CM Punk after WWE Survivor Series: WarGames.
articles.content: Saturday night featured a significant moment in pro wrestling history: the return of CM Punk to WWE. After WWE Survivor Series: WarGames came to a close, the company held a press conference kicked of… [+1758 chars]
